Articles.Content:
Hello people viewing this! I am currently trying to make a Russian Mig-15, and American F-86 Sabre but I can't get the right parts to do so, Could someone please edit, and give me an AV-R8 Winglet about the same dimensions as the Swept wings? Also could you give me another AV-R8 Winglet that's just a little bit smaller? And lastly, can I get a very small version of all the jet engines?? Thank you for the help.

~ThatOneGuy
